item.description:
http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=246689425376836

 

Itinerary finalized for our Boston pub crawl to support Ron Paul and his HR 1139 "Keep Your Tips Act".

Final itinerary as follows:

7:30pm – 8:30pm
McFadden’s Restaurant and Saloon
148 State Street

8:45pm – 9:30pm
Cheers Boston
Faneuil Hall Marketplace
Quincy Market, South

9:45pm – 10:30pm
Jose McIntyre’s
160 Milk Street

10:45pm – 11:30pm
Good Bar
183 State Street

11:45pm - ?
MIJA Cantina & Tequila Bar
Faneuil Hall Marketplace
Quincy Market, South

 

Our compatriots in New Hampshire have already had similar pub crawls in Manchester, Portsmouth, and Concord.  In each case, a respective local newspaper has published the announcement; for example: http://www.concordmonitor.com/article/269314/ron-paul-backers-plan-bar-crawl .  And for an idea of how much fun we had that night, check this picture: http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f339/shemdogg/278773_2059795586059_1579742762_1949255_3860963_o.jpg
item.name: Boston Ron Paul Pub Crawl!
